pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static, wide-angle shot of a dramatic arctic or antarctic landscape. A large, sculpted iceberg dominates the foreground, while in the distance, a small boat sits in a patch of bright sunlight reflecting on the water. The scene is framed by hazy, snow-covered mountains in the background.
